long_description: Designed for fun days in town or out in the hills, the prAna Shadow jacket offers the style of a shirt with water-, wrinkle- and abrasion- resistant Stretch Zion nylon/spandex performance fabric. Stretch Zion nylon/spandex fabric also dries quickly and is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. Front placket zips and snaps closed to keep out cool breezes. Two chest pockets. prAna Shadow jacket has a standard fit. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for fun days in town or out in the hills, the prAna Shadow jacket offers the style of a shirt with water-, wrinkle- and abrasion- resistant Stretch Zion nylon/spandex performance fabric.
